text:
Alexander Jacob Betts Goss (also known as Alejandro Betts; 28 October 1947 – 13 March 2020) was a Falklands-born Argentine air-traffic controller and historian. He worked with the Argentine government as a Technical Advisor on the Tierra del Fuego Malvinas Question Provincial Observatory Advisory Council.
Betts supported Argentina's claim to the Falkland Islands and is a controversial figure in the Falklands as a result.
